content:
• Prime location in the heart of Beverly Hills
  • Walking distance to top destinations
  • Upscale Restaurant and Bar
  • Valet parking. Valet hours from 7 a.m. - 11 p.m., $42 per night for overnight parking.
  • Intimate Pool
  • Business Center
  • Pet-friendly. The Mosaic Hotel is proudly dog-friendly and welcomes dogs that weigh up to 40 pounds. Guests with dogs are required to pay a non-refundable $150 deposit per stay.
  • Complimentary Bike Rental
